message: The INST_MANDATE field for indicator 3-d-1, translated into en
data: In 2008, the World Health Assembly, through the adoption of Resolution WHA61(2), and later in 2018 with the Resolution WHA71(15), decided that "that States Parties and the Director-General shall continue to report annually to the Health Assembly on the implementation of the International Health Regulations (2005), using the self-assessment annual reporting tool". In December 2021, and under Resolution WHA75, an updated SPAR tool second edition was published.
